name: Maven Youth+LGBT+ Youth Summer Tech Camp
description: Maven Youth is a national nonprofit organization that empowers LGBTQ+ youth through technology, leadership, and career development. Founded to bridge the gap between queer youth and the tech industry, Maven Youth offers programs like summer tech camps, hackathons, digital storytelling workshops, and Youth leadership. Their mission is to create a more inclusive tech world by fostering innovation and confidence in LGBTQ+ young people.
